text:
- [Narrator] Working from
home is now the norm.
Running secure Cisco solutions on AWS,

lets you scale up and down
as needed for hybrid work.
Here's an example.

Joel and Steph work for
a global investment firm
that urgently needs to go

from securely supporting
hundreds of remote analysts
to thousands.
Joel needs a VPN that can scale rapidly
to accommodate thousands of daily logins.

He chooses Cisco Secure
Firewall ASA Virtual.

Steph goes with Cisco Duo
Multi-Factor Authentication

to address compliance and ensure
consistent access policies.
Both were up and running super fast
using AWS Quick Start automated scripts.

Joel now has to figure out
how to protect thousands
of analysts devices from threats.
Cisco Umbrella to the rescue.

In just 24 hours, it blocks
thousands of malware requests.

For extra insurance, Steph
installs, Cisco ThousandEyes.

It identifies issues in the
remote user's wifi networks
and internet connections.
It also monitors data center and SaaS apps
accessed from hundreds of branch offices
through Cisco SD WAN.
Auditors are impressed.

Analysts need to connect
with clients and one another.

Steph knew an Agile cloud
solution that could keep up
with rapidly changing usage was critical.

Cisco WebEx was a no brainer
as it natively integrates
with our conference room hardware.

With Cisco and AWS, you
can securely, rapidly

and consistently connect
remote workers no matter when,

where or how many while meeting
compliance requirements.
(upbeat music)
